description: Abracadabra.money is a lending platform that accepts interest-bearing tokens such as Yearn Vaults as collateral to borrow a USD-pegged stablecoin, Magic Internet Money (MIM), that can then be used as any other traditional stablecoin. In this way, MIM helps unlock capital deposited in Yearn while still earning users yield on the underlying assets.

tr.description: Abracadabra.money, Yearn Vaults gibi faiz getiren jetonları teminat olarak kabul eden ve daha sonra başka herhangi bir geleneksel stabilcoin olarak kullanılabilecek bir USD sabit parası olan Magic Internet Money'i (MIM) ödünç alan bir borç verme platformudur. Bu şekilde, MIM, Yearn'de yatırılan sermayenin kilidini açmaya yardımcı olurken, aynı zamanda temel varlıklar üzerinde kullanıcıların getirisini kazanmaya devam eder.

vi.description: Abracadabra.money is a lending platform that accepts interest-bearing tokens such as Yearn Vaults as collateral to borrow a USD-pegged stablecoin, Magic Internet Money (MIM), that can then be used as any other traditional stablecoin. In this way, MIM helps unlock capital deposited in Yearn while still earning users yield on the underlying assets.

zh.description: Abracadabra.money 是借贷平台，允许用户存入生息代币（如 Yearn 的机枪池代币）作为抵押品借出 MIM，MIM 是与其他传统的稳定币一样使用的美元稳定币。这样用户的资金在 Yearn 的机枪池赚取收益的同时，还通过 MIM 解锁了流动性。
